generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with a cobblestone texture, extending from the foreground into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian path is visible on both sides of the road, separated by low fences and curbs.
- building: A brick building is visible on the left side of the image, and a portion of a building with a brick facade is visible on the right.
- wall: A low stone wall runs along the right side of the road, separating it from the building.
- fence: A black metal fence runs along the left side of the road, separating it from the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with traffic signs on the right side of the road and another with streetlights.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign, a circular sign with an arrow, and a "24t" weight limit sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible behind the fence on the left side of the road.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper right corner.
- person: A person is visible on the left side of the road, pushing a stroller.
- car: A black car is partially visible on the left side of the road, parked next to the sidewalk.
